import altair as alt
import pandas as pd
from prepare import streamlit_theme

alt.themes.register("streamlit", streamlit_theme)
alt.themes.enable("streamlit")

data = pd.read_csv("tracks.csv")
data["played_at"] = pd.to_datetime(data["played_at"]).dt.tz_convert("US/Pacific")

voi = [
    "played_at",
    "track_artists",
    "track_name",
    "album_name",
    "album_artist_name",
    "album_artists",
    "album_release_date",
    "album_release_date_precision",
    "album_total_tracks",
    "track_track_number",
    "track_popularity",
    "track_duration_ms",
    "track_explicit",
    "track_spotify_url",
    "track_preview_url",
    "track_uri",
    "track_disc_number",
    "track_href",
    "track_id",
    "track_is_local",
    "track_external_ids_isrc",
    "track_artists_uris",
    "album_spotify_url",
    "album_uri",
    "album_id",
    "album_href",
    "album_image_640x640_url",
    "album_image_300x300_url",
    "album_image_64x64_url",
    "album_artist_spotify_url",

]

data = data[voi]
